title: Hallie Hippo Happy Hour
description: The show based on the popular children’s toy. Whether Hallie’s a soccer player, figure skater, chef, or spy, a first-rate nurse or a private eye, geologist, gymnast, or astronaut orbiting space, she’s always gonna save the day!
alt1: Hallie the chef cooking some eggs
alt2: Hallie inspecting the sky with a magnifying glass
alt3: Hallie the geologist cracks a rock open and there’s gold inside
alt4: Hallie the astronaut floating in space
